ygData.subject: Help on Drosco/Wolten Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi folks, I m stumped and would like a bit of advice please. I ve gotten the letter off of Drosco in the Qeynos sewers and turned it in to Wolten at the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi folks,

I'm stumped and would like a bit of advice please.

I've gotten the letter off of Drosco in the Qeynos sewers and turned it
in to Wolten at the paladin guild for the note to carry to Freeport. I
then spent two hours running through Highpass Hold to Freeport (pants
and wheezes). But then I spent hours running all over the temple of
Marr in North Freeport without ever finding the woman I'm supposed to
give the letter to for my reward. I thought she might be keeping
bankers's hours so I wandered around the temple for two days and nights
(game time) without ever seeing her.

Can someone please tell me where she is? I'll run back to Freeport if I
can be certain of finding her, but it's a very long trip to waste time
on just for the hell of it. Please help me.


Barthos (druid of 8 seasons living on Bristlebane)
